text: Hello!  I'm working for a client that has a HubSpot site using the old Dnd Templates and was wondering if there is a way to use the {% include %} tag for the main stylesheet to have in minify before loading.  As it is now it is attached to the template in the design manager and obviously will not minify.
use require_css to attach stylesheets to a template. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#require-css>
